name: Age of Wonders II: The Wizard's Throne
description: Age of Wonders II is the wildly anticipated sequel to the award-winning strategy phenomenon. Delivering an invigorating mix of Empire Building, Role-playing, and Warfare, Age of Wonders II brings s turn-based strategy to new heights.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 95 or later Processor: Intel Pentium 300+ CPU Memory: 64MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphic card Hard Drive: 500MB hard disk

reviews.review_text: wonderful game for fans of turn based strategy games! i did enjoy 'age of wonders: shadow magic' more but it's still great. great example of how much fun a rather simple game can be and also how much it can challenge you!
Old School but a Nice play if you like turn base.
One of my all-time favorite Strategy games. Old-School fantasy style.
Get it somewhere else, the steam version has serious problems.

Loved this game years ago. Finaly bought it on steam because good turn based strategy games are hard to comeby these days. I recommend this game only if you are okay with playing in windowed mode as there is no option for fullscreen. I have not played a match on steam yet, mostly because I hate playing in windowed mode so I have no information on actual game play. Warning for those wanted to play multiplay: when I played this game years ago it had terrible issues with desynchronizing and crashing. Just a heads up. To be perfectly honest I will probably never launch this game again since AoW3 is out. I own this game out of nostalgia, so I cannot recommend this to nonAoW / TBS fans.
